alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 4:44PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Beltrami and southeastern Lake of the Woods Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 8 miles north of BIg Bog State Recreation Area, or 56 miles north of Bemidji, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts possible, winds in excess of 40 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... BIg Bog State Recreation Area and northeastern Upper Red Lake. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami
